select sum(a.cnt) from ( select count(*) as cnt from adr_private_member where mail_user_seq = #mailUserSeq# and delete_flag='Y' and del_time > #deleteDate#
union
select count(*) as cnt from adr_private_member where mail_user_seq=#mailUserSeq# and add_time > #insertDate#

select sum(a.cnt) from (
select count(*) as cnt from tscheduler where mail_user_seq = #mailUserSeq# and outlook_sync = 'delete' and modify_time > #deleteDate#
union
select count(*) as cnt from tscheduler where mail_user_seq=#mailUserSeq# and outlook_sync != 'delete' and modify_time > #updateDate#
union
select count(*) as cnt from tscheduler where mail_user_seq=#mailUserSeq# and outlook_sync != 'delete' and create_time > #insertDate#
) a
